hints.content:
We can solve this problem in two ways:

$\qquad \begin{align}&\green8 \text{ birds she saw}\\
+&\underline{ \blue{?} \text{ birds left to see}}\\
=&\pink{20} \text{ birds in total}\end{align}$

Or:

$\qquad \begin{align}&\pink{20} \text{ birds in total}\\
-& \underline{\green8 \text{ birds she saw}}\\
=&\blue{?} \text{ birds left to see}\end{align}$

question.content:
Ivy wants to see $20$ birds on her hike. So far, she has seen $8$. 

**How many more birds does she need to see? ** 

[[☃ input-number 1]] birds
